alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 07 at 4:58AM PDT until May 09 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 3 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range. * WHEN...From noon today to 3 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Highways 101 and 192. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range
